attributes.action: Make Mr Nigel Farage Priminister leading Britain out the EU into independence
attributes.additional_details:
We as a country have won the vote for independence out of the EU. 
We are in a situation where we are going to need someone that has the knowledge and research of leaving the EU into independence. 
With this we are going to need a strong leader leading us out of the EU and negotiating trade deals with other countries. Mr Farage has supported and played a key part in the Vote Leave campaign.
This is a great opportunity for us as a country to vote for the right person
Please support & share
attributes.background:
We as a country have won the vote for independence out of the EU. 
With this we are going to need a strong leader leading us out of the EU and negotiating trade deals with other countries. Mr Farage has supported and played a key part in the Vote Leave campaign. 
Please support & share

rejection.details: In any case, as you might already know, the Prime Minister of the UK is not chosen by the UK Government or Parliament.
